Author: firsttokenasia
Title: [ANN][ICO] First Token Asia – Asia’s Community-Based Crypto Investment Bank
Body: FIRST TOKEN ASIA – Building Asia's First Community-Based Crypto Investment Bank  We are from First Token Asia (“FTA”) and we are looking to build Asia’s first community-based crypto investment bank.  To help us get there, we are launching our initial token offering on 26 November 2017 and ending on 21 January 2018.  A link to our platform which contains further details of our offering can be found below: Our weblink https://www.firsttokenasia.com Our ICO page with whitepaper link https://www.firsttokenasia.com/ico  First Token Asia's key value propositions:  1. Not only will blockchain technology prove a game changer in terms of pure technical innovation, we believe that the ICO mechanism can potentially disrupt even traditional capital markets and finance as we know of     today, yielding a new era of what we consider "Capital Markets 2.0". 2. Asia is home to several of the world's largest and fastest growing economies, more than 66% of the world's population, as well as 30% of all Unicorns in the world today.  In spite of this - venture capital funding to     the region remains at merely 11% of total VC-backed financing. 3. We believe there is very real and under-served demand for ICO-based financing from Asian businesses. 4. Unlike most other ICO Advisory Platforms, the FTA team is made up primarily of seasoned banking professionals, all of whom born and bred in Asia and culturally sensitive to Asian needs and customs.  FTA seeks     to differentiate itself from other ICO advisors by playing up our advisory and structuring background, as well as a willingness to handhold our clients throughout the ICO process. 5. The FTA token has inbuilt smart contract features which allow tokenholders to vote - in exchange for rewards - on which prospective ICOs are the most attractive amongst FTA's deal pipeline. FTA intends to leverage     on community involvement/ market forces to identify the most attractive ICOs to bring to market. 6. In an industry that is near impossible for any regulator to effectively govern, we believe that the ICO market needs to function based on self-governance.  We view one possible way in which the market could     evolve could be that ICOs backed by credible Advisors such as FTA gradually come to be viewed as quasi-regulated and hence more reputable given the additional layer of third party supervision.  Join us as we build Asia’s first community-based crypto investment bank! More details on our webpage and whitepaper - link above
